OrgName: Data.com, a division of salesforce.com inc.
activities: Jigsaw (doing business as Data.com, a division of salesforce.com inc.) provides an online directory of company and business contact information to its customers to assist them in their sales and marketing efforts and to help them update their own internal records. This business contact information is provided via www.data.com/connect or associated Web pages, or through the Data.com services accessed via the Salesforce services branded as Force.com, Site.com, Database.com Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Communities, and Chatter. Business contact information includes personal data such as an individual’s name, title and work contact information. In this context, Data.com acts as a data controller. As part of Data.com’s service offerings, Data.com may process data and information on behalf of its customers. In this context, Data.com acts as a data processor on behalf of its customers. As part of Data.com’s internal operations, Data.com transfers personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective partners to Data.com’s U.S. data centers for processing and storage.
corpofftitle1: Vice President, Global Privacy & Associate General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
